#summary This page provides help for Administrators / End Users to configure and use the site according to their business requirements.

= Administrators / End Users !RoadMap =

The following are the identified tasks that an end user or Administration can perform on the created site.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/CreateSite Create your portal in SharePoint 2010 using Small Business Site Template with step by step guide] 
    * This will guide to how to make the sharepoint site using this project template.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/AnonymousAccess Set Anonymous access on site]
    * This will guide how to set the anonymous access on for anonymous users on the site.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/LoginAsAdmnistrator Login as Administrator]
    * This will help administrator to login the site once the anonymous access is set on.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/ModifyingImages Modifying Site Logo and other images]
    * This will help the administrator to modify the site logo as well as the all the other images used in the site.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/ServicesOfferedWebPart Modifying Services Offered images and description]
    * This will help the administrator to configure the Services offered webpart images, title and description.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/ModifyingSiteContent Modifying Site Content]
    * This will help the administrator to change the content on the page eg, text written on the About Us page.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/CreatePages Create internal pages using Custom Page layouts]
    * This will help the administrator, how to create a new page and change the layout of any page.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/ConfigListHeaderFooter Using Configuration list to:]
    * Update the Contact Us header value
    * Update the Footer value

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/QueryUsWebPart Using Query Us Web Part to:]
    * Configure Web Part properties to send mail to administrators or other users
    * Configure Mail templates from Configuration list to send Admin mail or self mails.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/LocationWebPartAdmin Using Location Web Part to:]
    * Configure Web Part properties to locate the organization on the google map.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/ServicesOfferedWebPart Service offered WebPart to:]
    * Show the Services offered by the organization.
	* Configure list items to show the the services offered in the webpart.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/ContactUsAddressWebPart Contact Us (Address) WebPart to:]
    * Configure Web Part properties to show the organization contact details.

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/ModifyTheme Modify the theme.]

  * [http://code.google.com/p/free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme/wiki/ModifySiteElements Modify Site elements (MasterPage, CSS)]
